title: Open Wait List
posting_body: A 2BD & 3BD units located in Los Angeles, CA.
Please contact Management by phone, no text messages accepted.
Features: Central A/C, on site laundry, on site gated parking
Community Amenities: On site property management, gated parking, on site laundry, gardening spots for residents
*Rent and income limits are subject to change.
Occupancy standards may vary depending on subsidy or other program guidelines.
Affordable rents are restricted in accordance with the HUD program and other Regulatory Agreements.
*Do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
